overview:
Cathal is CEO of FeedHenry and is leading the drive to become the largest provider of business apps for smartphones and social media worldwide.

Cathal is based in the US where he spends about half his time with the remainder spent in Europe meeting customers and partners.

From 2005 to the end of 2009 Cathal was President of Arantech Inc., the North American subsidiary of Aran Technologies Ltd., a company specializing in CEM for the telecoms industry which was acquired in 2009.

Prior to this, he was Founder and CEO of Performix Technologies, another Irish technology company focused on the area of Performance Management solutions, and sold in 2005.

He has served on the boards of several technology start-ups and is a member of the North American Advisory Board of the Michael Smurfit Business School. Cathal holds an MBA from the Smurfit Business School and a BE from UCD.
